extendedInfo.description: Finally, a way to keep up to date with clinical trials in heart failure! Used by thousands of satisfied customers across the world, Heart Failure Trials (CHF Trials) is available for Androidâ¢ platforms as well as the iPhoneÂ®, iTouchÂ®, and iPadÂ®.See for yourself why iMedicalApps.com has called heart failure trials "a must have app for anyone that manages heart failure patients."Heart Failure Trials puts you in control of heart failure research with up to date evidence based medicine. Heart Failure Trials was designed and written by David Majure, MD MPH, a heart failure cardiologist trained at the University of California, San Francisco, and The Johns Hopkins Hospital and member of the Heart Failure and Transplant Medicine Education Workforce of the International Society of Heart and Lung Transplantation. Dr. Majure strives to keep the database up to date with expert opinion that puts each trial in context. Current subjects include:â¢	ACEI/ARBsâ¢	Beta-Blockersâ¢	Aldosterone Receptor Blockersâ¢	Direct Renin Inhibitorsâ¢	Vasodilatorsâ¢	Phosphodiesterase-5 Inhibitorsâ¢	Inotropes/Inodilatorsâ¢	Diureticsâ¢	Vasopressin Receptor Blockersâ¢	Sinus Node Inhibitorsâ¢	Calcium Channel Blockersâ¢	Antiarrhythmicsâ¢	Antithromboticsâ¢	Atrial Fibrillationâ¢	Statinsâ¢	Fish Oil (n-3 PUFA)â¢	Anemia and Iron Therapyâ¢	ICDs/CRTâ¢	LVADsâ¢	Surgical Therapyâ¢	Cell Therapyâ¢	Pulmonary Artery Cathetersâ¢	Telemonitoringâ¢	Ultrafiltrationâ¢	Non-Invasive Ventilationâ¢	BNP-Guided Therapyâ¢	Exercise-Therapyâ¢	CounselingUpdate section alerts you to new trial additions and updates to existing trial commentary. Each entry contains:â¢	Important points â¢      Links to study PDFs and PubMed abstractsâ¢	Trial purposeâ¢	Inclusion and exclusion criteria â¢	Methods and procedures â¢	Baseline characteristics â¢	Baseline therapy â¢	Primary and secondary outcomes with RRR, ARR, and NNTâ¢	Applicable ACCF/AHA and ESC guidelines â¢	Detailed references to guide further readingKey Words: Cardiology, ISHLT, ESC, ACC, AHA, Heart Failure, CHF, Clinical Trials, Medicine

reviews.title: A must have app for any cardiologist.
reviews.comment: Excellent ap, very thorough. I had the iPhone version and this is much improved. The addition of a search function is very helpful. Version 2.5 has fixed the stability issue which some people had.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great resource for anyone in heart failure field especially fellows
reviews.author: Khaled Chatila

reviews.title: best heart failure app there is
reviews.comment: When I first downloaded, I was disappointed that it crashed a lot, so I emailed the developers. Within a few days, they were able to correct the problem, and now it runs smoothly on my s3. this was recommended to me by my attending, and now i reference it all the time. -pgy1
reviews.author: Jason Zhu

reviews.comment: Crashes all time please correct the issue
reviews.author: Vaibhav Tyagi

reviews.title: Must have for cardiology
reviews.comment: Pharmacy involvement plays huge role this app helps for quick reference and allows for high quality recommendations. Only bad thing about it is android version is little buggy.
reviews.author: John Lee

reviews.title: Easy access
reviews.comment: sound smart on rounds and at noon report
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great medical resource app
reviews.comment: Up to date, browsable and search, links to PDFs. Very nice resource.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incredible app
reviews.comment: Please continue to update and develop this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Wish all fields of medicine had a comparable app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eccellente!!!!!
reviews.comment: Pratico, completo, consultazione immediata e superaggiornato. Butterei via tutti i libri sullo scompenso! Great job! Thank you!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best medical app
reviews.comment: I wish there was an app like this for all diseases
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Superb app, concise, succinct, well laid out
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful and very up to date.
reviews.comment: This app really makes it easier to get my head around the heart failure trials. Very useful and very up to date. Well worth the purchase.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A well organized, convenient, useable, and accurate compendium of the CHF evidence base. We need one like this for all disease entities....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Well written summaries of major trials. Well organized and easy to search through.
reviews.author: A Google User
